summary: A manager prioritizes ethical conduct over potential profit, deciding to address dishonest behavior to maintain integrity within the business.
An individual enforces fair practices by taking action against unethical behavior, ensuring that all team members are treated justly.
The importance of maintaining integrity in professional settings is highlighted when a leader chooses principles over financial gain.
Unethical actions, such as claiming undue credit, lead to disciplinary measures, emphasizing the repercussions of dishonest behavior.
